caption:
The photograph features a man in the foreground and a scenic landscape in the background. The man, likely middle-aged, has a thick beard and mustache, and is wearing glasses with round frames. He is dressed in a light-colored, patterned sweater or shirt. His expression is serious, and he is looking slightly off-camera.

The background displays a vibrant maritime scene. A harbor with various boats docked along a pier extends into a calm blue body of water, which dominates the middle ground. On both sides of the harbor, lush green trees and foliage are visible, suggesting a rich, natural environment. The far background shows more forested areas and hills, indicating a coastal or lakeside setting. The sky above is clear and blue, contributing to the overall serene and picturesque setting of the scene.
title: Mr. Charles Nash, postmaster of Friday Harbor, is leading a fight to block the building of a major condominium.
